property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this list.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
